p: Down regulation of HLA-II and costimulation molecules such CD86, CD80, and CD40 have been reported in DCs after stimulation with IVIg [ 85]. In patients with systemic lupus erythematosus, which show a high proinflammatory environment, administration of IVIg abrogated IFN-Î±-mediated maturation [ 89, 90]. All together, data suggest that infusion of plasma from recovered COVID-19 donors may enhance anti-inflammatory properties of DCs, which could be critical in phases of excessive inflammatory stimuli in patients with COVID-19.
